stages.logText: Umar told me to visit Defy in Sullengard to instruct him to give the villagers their share.
Defy told me that there will be a delay in giving the villagers of Sullengard their fair share for some unknown reason. I must report this to Umar at once.
Umar instructed me to talk to Defy once more.
Defy and his friends have vanished! Back to Umar ...
I told Umar about the disappearance of Defy and his men. But Umar didn't believe me and he even sent me back to find them. I better ask the villagers there.
There was a distressed man, whom just had his first child, who hinted to me of wherabouts of Defy and his men. I must report this to Umar once more.
With Sullengard running into financial trouble, Umar is enraged by Defy's traitorous way.
Umar gave me a task to give the mayor at least 50000 gold coins as the promised share for their living. After that, I'm instructed to report back immediately.
At last, Sullengard can now sleep calmly and eat sufficiently with their finances restored.
